◆ getUniqueID()

void CanTask::getUniqueID ( uint8_t  out[uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0_unique_id_ARRAY_CAPACITY_],
uint64_t  serNumb 
)
staticprivate

Ritorna unique-ID 128-bit del nodo locale. E' utilizzato in uavcan.node.GetInfo.Response e durante plug-and-play node-ID allocation da uavcan.pnp.NodeIDAllocationData. SerialNumber, Produttore.. Dovrebbe essere verificato in uavcan.node.GetInfo.Response per la verifica non sia cambiato Nodo. Al momento vengono inseriti 2 BYTE fissi, altri eventuali, che Identificano il Tipo Modulo.

Parameters
outdata out UniqueID
serNumblocal Hardware Serial Number (64Bit) Already Send in PNP 1.0 Request (Hash 48Bit)

Definition at line 89 of file can_task.cpp.

90 {
91  // A real hardware node would read its unique-ID from some hardware-specific source (typically stored in ROM).
92  // This example is a software-only node so we store the unique-ID in a (read-only) register instead.
93  static uavcan_register_Value_1_0 val = {0};
94  uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_unstructured_(&val);
95 
96  // Crea default unique_id con 8 BYTES From local_serial Number (N.B. serNumb[0] rappresenta Tipo Nodo )
97  uint8_t *ptrData = (uint8_t*)&serNumb;
98  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 8; i++)
99  {
100  val.unstructured.value.elements[val.unstructured.value.count++] = ptrData[i];
101  }
102  // Il resto dei 128 vengono impostati RANDOM
103  for (uint8_t i = val.unstructured.value.count; i < uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0_unique_id_ARRAY_CAPACITY_; i++)
104  {
105  val.unstructured.value.elements[val.unstructured.value.count++] = (uint8_t) rand(); // NOLINT
106  }
107  localRegisterAccessLock->Take();
108  localRegister->read(REGISTER_UAVCAN_UNIQUE_ID, &val);
109  localRegisterAccessLock->Give();
110  LOCAL_ASSERT(uavcan_register_Value_1_0_is_unstructured_(&val) &&
111  val.unstructured.value.count == uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0_unique_id_ARRAY_CAPACITY_);
112  memcpy(&out[0], &val.unstructured.value, uavcan_node_GetInfo_Response_1_0_unique_id_ARRAY_CAPACITY_);
113 }

45  {
46  // Normal Mode (TX/RX Full functionally)
47  if(ModeCan == CAN_ModePower::CAN_INIT) {
48  canPower = ModeCan;
49  digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, LOW);
50  digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, LOW);
51  // Waiting min of 5 uS for Full Operational Setup bxCan && Hal_Can_Init
52  delayMicroseconds(10);
53  digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, HIGH);
54  digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_EN, HIGH);
55  }
56  // Exit if state is the same
57  if (canPower == ModeCan) return;
58  // Normal Mode (TX/RX Full functionally)
59  if(ModeCan == CAN_ModePower::CAN_NORMAL) {
60  digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, HIGH);
61  delayMicroseconds(10);
62  digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_EN, HIGH);
63  // Waiting min of 65 uS for Full Operational External CAN Power Circuit
64  // Perform secure WakeUp Timer with 100 uS
65  delayMicroseconds(90);
66  }
67  // Listen Mode (Only RX circuit enabled for first paket data)
68  if(ModeCan == CAN_ModePower::CAN_LISTEN_ONLY) {
69  digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_EN, LOW);
70  delayMicroseconds(10);
71  digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, HIGH);
72  }
73  // Sleep (Turn OFF HW and enter sleep mode TJA1443)
74  if(ModeCan == CAN_ModePower::CAN_SLEEP) {
75  digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_STB, LOW);
76  delayMicroseconds(10);
77  digitalWrite(PIN_CAN_EN, HIGH);
78  }
79  // Saving state
80  canPower = ModeCan;
81 }

875  if(clCanard.master.file.is_firmware()) {

877  // Segalo a LCD aggiornamento fw to flash in corso da CAN BUS
878  localSystemStatusLock->Take();
879  localSystemStatus->flags.fw_updating = true;
880  localSystemStatusLock->Give();
881  } else {
882  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("RX FILE READ BLOCK LEN: "));
883  }
884  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("%d\r\n"), resp.data.value.count);
885  // Save Data in Flash File at Block Position (Init = Rewrite file...)
886  if(putFlashFile(clCanard.master.file.get_name(), clCanard.master.file.is_firmware(), clCanard.master.file.is_first_data_block(),
887  resp.data.value.elements, resp.data.value.count)) {
888  // Reset pending command (Comunico request/Response Serie di comandi OK!!!)
889  // Uso l'Overload con controllo di EOF (-> EOF se msgLen != UAVCAN_BLOCK_DEFAULT [256 Bytes])
890  // Questo Overload gestisce in automatico l'offset del messaggio, per i successivi blocchi
891  clCanard.master.file.reset_pending(resp.data.value.count);
892  } else {
893  // Error Save... Abort request
894  TRACE_ERROR_F(F("SAVING BLOCK FILE ERROR, ABORT RX !!!\r\n"));
895  clCanard.master.file.download_end();
896  }
897  }
898  } else {
899  // Errore Nodo non settato...
900  TRACE_ERROR_F(F("RX FILE READ BLOCK REJECT: Node_Id not valid or not set\r\n"));
901  }
902  }
903  // Risposta ad un servizio (dati) dinamicamente allocato... ( deve essere ultimo else )
904  // Servizio di risposta alla richiesta su modulo slave, verifica della risposta e della coerenza messaggio
905  // Per il nodo che risponde verifico i servizi attivi per la corrispondenza dinamica risposta
906  else
907  {
908  // Nodo rispondente (posso avere senza problemi più servizi con stesso port_id su diversi nodi)
909  uint8_t queueId = clCanard.getSlaveIstanceFromId(transfer->metadata.remote_node_id);
910  // Se nodo correttammente allocato e gestito
911  if (queueId != GENERIC_BVAL_UNDEFINED) {
912  // Verifico se risposta del servizio corrisponde al chiamante (eventuali + servizi sotto...)
913  // Gestione di tutti i servizi possibili allocabili, valido per tutti i nodi
914  if (transfer->metadata.port_id == clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_port_id())
915  {
916  // Utilizzo un buffer di allocazione per RX Messaggio in Casting da postare sul meteodo Slave Canard
917  uint8_t castLocalBuffer[RMAP_DATA_MAX_ELEMENT_SIZE];
918  memset(castLocalBuffer, 0, sizeof(castLocalBuffer));
919  // Resetta il pending del comando del nodo verificato (size_mem preparato in avvio)
920  // Copia la risposta nella variabile di chiamata in state
921  // N.B. possibile gestire qua tutte le occorrenze per stima V4
922  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::th) {
923  rmap_service_module_TH_Response_1_0 *respCastTH = (rmap_service_module_TH_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
924  size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
925  if (rmap_service_module_TH_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastTH, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
926  {
927  clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastTH, sizeof(*respCastTH));
928  }
929  }
930  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::rain) {
931  rmap_service_module_Rain_Response_1_0 *respCastRain = (rmap_service_module_Rain_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
932  size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
933  if (rmap_service_module_Rain_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastRain, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
934  {
935  clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastRain, sizeof(*respCastRain));
936  }
937  }
938  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::wind) {
939  rmap_service_module_Wind_Response_1_0 *respCastWind = (rmap_service_module_Wind_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
940  size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
941  if (rmap_service_module_Wind_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastWind, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
942  {
943  clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastWind, sizeof(*respCastWind));
944  }
945  }
946  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::radiation) {
947  rmap_service_module_Radiation_Response_1_0 *respCastRadiation = (rmap_service_module_Radiation_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
948  size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
949  if (rmap_service_module_Radiation_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastRadiation, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
950  {
951  clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastRadiation, sizeof(*respCastRadiation));
952  }
953  }
954  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::vwc) {
955  rmap_service_module_VWC_Response_1_0 *respCastVWC = (rmap_service_module_VWC_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
956  size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
957  if (rmap_service_module_VWC_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastVWC, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
958  {
959  clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastVWC, sizeof(*respCastVWC));
960  }
961  }
962  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == Module_Type::power) {
963  rmap_service_module_Power_Response_1_0 *respCastPower = (rmap_service_module_Power_Response_1_0 *)castLocalBuffer;
964  size_t size = transfer->payload_size;
965  if (rmap_service_module_Power_Response_1_0_deserialize_(respCastPower, static_cast<uint8_t const*>(transfer->payload), &size) >= 0)
966  {
967  clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending(respCastPower, sizeof(*respCastPower));
968  }
969  }
970  }
971  }
972  }
973  }
974  else
975  {
976  // Se arrivo quà è un errore di sviluppo, controllare setup sottoscrizioni, risposte e messaggi
977  LOCAL_ASSERT(false);
978  }
979 }

198  }

206  if (localFlash->BSP_QSPI_Erase_Block(canFlashBlock)) {

209  }
210  }
211  }

213  if(count!=0x100) {
214  // Write Info File for Closing...
215  // Size at
216  uint64_t lenghtFile = canFlashPtr - FLASH_INFO_SIZE_LEN;
217  if (is_firmware) {
218  // Firmware Flash

220  } else {
221  // Standard File Data Upload
222  canFlashPtr = FLASH_FILE_POSITION;
223  }

225  // Write into Flash

230  TRACE_INFO_F(F("FLASH: Reading check OK\r\n"));
231  } else {
232  TRACE_INFO_F(F("FLASH: Reading check ERROR\r\n"));
233  }
234  #endif

1414  param.configuration->board_slave[iIdxRst].is_configured[isCfg] = false;
1415  }
1416  #endif
1417

1425  getStimaDescriptionByType(description_board, param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].module_type);

1427  description_board, param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_address,

1431  param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_address,

1435  param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].serial_number);
1436  }
1437  #else
1438  // Configure istance in a class

1440  param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_address,
1441  param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].module_type,
1442  param.configuration->board_slave[iCnt].can_port_id);

1444  #endif

1695 
1696  // Avvio il modulo UAVCAN in modalità operazionale normale
1697  // Eventuale SET Flag dopo acquisizione di configurazioni e/o parametri da Remoto
1698  clCanard.flag.set_local_node_mode(uavcan_node_Mode_1_0_OPERATIONAL);
1699 
1700  // Set START Timetable LOOP RX/TX. Set Canard microsecond start, per le sincronizzazioni
1701  clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.start_syncronization);
1702  last_pub_heartbeat = clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time) + MEGA * (TIME_PUBLISH_HEARTBEAT + random(100) / 100);
1703  next_timesyncro_msg = clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.syncronized_time) + MEGA;
1704  last_pub_port_list = last_pub_heartbeat + MEGA * (0.5);
1705 
1706  // Passo alla gestione Main
1707  state = CAN_STATE_CHECK;
1708  break;
1709 
1710  // ********************************************************************************
1711  // AVVIA LOOP CANARD PRINCIPALE gestione TX/RX Code -> Messaggi
1712  // ********************************************************************************
1713  case CAN_STATE_CHECK:
1714 
1715  // Set Canard microsecond corrente monotonic, per le attività temporanee di ciclo
1716  clCanard.getMicros(clCanard.start_syncronization);
1717 
1718  // ************************************************************************
1719  // *************** CHECK OFFLINE/DEADLINE COMMAND/STATE ***************
1720  // ************************************************************************
1721 
1722  // **********************************************************
1723  // Per la coda/istanze allocate valide SLAVE remote_node_flag
1724  // **********************************************************
1725  for (byte queueId = 0; queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; queueId++) {
1726  if (clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id() <= CANARD_NODE_ID_MAX) {
1727  // Check eventuale Nodo OFFLINE (Ultimo comando sempre perchè posso)
1728  // Effettuare eventuali operazioni di SET,RESET Cmd in sicurezza
1729  if (clCanard.slave[queueId].is_entered_offline()) {
1730  // Entro in OffLine
1731  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Nodo OFFLINE !!! Alert -> : %d\r\n"), clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id());
1732  // Metto i Flag in sicurezza, laddove dove non eventualmente gestito
1733  // Eventuali altre operazioni quà su Reset Comandi
1734  clCanard.slave[queueId].command.reset_pending();
1735  clCanard.slave[queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
1736  clCanard.slave[queueId].file_server.reset_pending();
1737  clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending();
1738  // Set system_status (Set Node Offline)
1739  // Set module_version to unknown version to force get reload version and revision
1740  // If new firmware are updated (local or remote command) node go to offline mode...
1741  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1742  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].is_online = false;
1743  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version = 0;
1744  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision = 0;
1745  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1746  }
1747  }
1748  }
1749 
1750 
1751  // **************************************************************************
1752  // *********************** FILE UPLOAD PROCESS HANDLER **********************
1753  // **************************************************************************
1754  // Verifica file download in corso (entro se in download)
1755  // Attivato da ricezione comando appropriato rxFile o rxFirmware
1756  if(clCanard.master.file.download_request()) {
1757  if(clCanard.master.file.is_firmware())
1758  // Set Flag locale per comunicazione HeartBeat... uploading OK in corso
1759  // Utilizzo locale per blocco procedure, sleep ecc. x Uploading
1760  clCanard.flag.set_local_fw_uploading(true);
1761  // Controllo eventuale timeOut del comando o RxBlocco e gestisco le Retry
1762  // Verifica TimeOUT Occurs per File download
1763  if(clCanard.master.file.event_timeout()) {
1764  TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Time OUT File... event occurs\r\n"));
1765  // Gestione Retry previste dal comando per poi abbandonare
1766  uint8_t retry; // In overload x LOGGING
1767  if(clCanard.master.file.next_retry(&retry)) {
1768  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Next Retry File read: %u\r\n"), retry);
1769  } else {
1770  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("MAX Retry File occurs, download file ABORT !!!\r\n"));
1771  clCanard.master.file.download_end();
1772  }
1773  }
1774  // Se messaggio in pending non faccio niente è attendo la fine del comando in run
1775  // In caso di errore subentrerà il TimeOut e verrà essere gestita la retry
1776  if(!clCanard.master.file.is_pending()) {
1777  // Fine pending, con messaggio OK. Verifico se EOF o necessario altro blocco
1778  if(clCanard.master.file.is_download_complete()) {
1779  if(clCanard.master.file.is_firmware()) {
1780  TRACE_INFO_F(F("RX FIRMWARE COMPLETED !!!\r\n"));
1781  } else {
1782  TRACE_INFO_F(F("RX FILE COMPLETED !!!\r\n"));
1783  }
1784  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("File name: %s\r\n"), clCanard.master.file.get_name());
1785  // GetInfo && Verify Start Updating...
1786  if(clCanard.master.file.is_firmware()) {
1787  // Module type also checked before startin firmware_upgrade
1788  uint8_t module_type;
1789  uint8_t version;
1790  uint8_t revision;
1791  uint64_t fwFileLen = 0;
1792  getFlashFwInfoFile(&module_type, &version, &revision, &fwFileLen);
1793  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Firmware V%d.%d, Size: %lu bytes is ready for flash updating\r\n"),version, revision, (uint32_t) fwFileLen);
1794  }
1795  // Nessun altro evento necessario, chiudo File e stati
1796  // procedo all'aggiornamento Firmware dopo le verifiche di conformità
1797  // Ovviamente se si tratta di un file firmware
1798  clCanard.master.file.download_end();
1799  // Comunico a HeartBeat (Yakut o Altri) l'avvio dell'aggiornamento (se il file è un firmware...)
1800  // Per Yakut Pubblicare un HeartBeat prima dell'Avvio quindi con il flag
1801  // clCanard.local_node.file.updating_run = true >> HeartBeat Comunica Upgrade...
1802  if(clCanard.master.file.is_firmware()) {
1803  clCanard.flag.set_local_node_mode(uavcan_node_Mode_1_0_SOFTWARE_UPDATE);
1804  start_firmware_upgrade = true;
1805  // Preparo la struttua per informare il Boot Loader
1806  param.boot_request->app_executed_ok = false;
1807  param.boot_request->backup_executed = false;
1808  param.boot_request->app_forcing_start = false;
1809  param.boot_request->rollback_executed = false;
1810  param.boot_request->request_upload = true;
1811  param.eeprom->Write(BOOT_LOADER_STRUCT_ADDR, (uint8_t*) param.boot_request, sizeof(bootloader_t));
1812  }
1813  // Il Firmware Upload dovrà partire necessariamente almeno dopo l'invio completo
1814  // di HeartBeat (svuotamento coda), quindi via subito in heart_beat send
1815  // Counque non rispondo più ai comandi di update con file.updating_run = true
1816  } else {
1817  // Avvio prima request o nuovo blocco (Set Flag e TimeOut)
1818  // Prima request (clCanard.local_node.file.offset == 0)
1819  // Firmmware Posizione blocco gestito automaticamente in sequenza Request/Read
1820  // Gestione retry (incremento su TimeOut/Error) Automatico in Init/Request-Response
1821  // Esco se raggiunga un massimo numero di retry x Frame... sopra
1822  // Get Data Block per popolare il File
1823  // Se il Buffer è pieno = 256 Caratteri è necessario continuare
1824  // Altrimenti se inferiore o (0 Compreso) il trasferimento file termina.
1825  // Se = 0 il blocco finale non viene considerato ma serve per il protocollo
1826  // Se l'ultimo buffer dovesse essere pieno discrimina l'eventualità di MaxBuf==Eof
1827  clCanard.master_file_read_block_pending(NODE_GETFILE_TIMEOUT_US);
1828  }
1829  }
1830  }
1831 
1832  // ***********************************************************************
1833  // ********** GET SYNCRO ACTIVITY FOR CYPAL RMAP DATA FUNCTION *********
1834  // ***********************************************************************
1835  // Test if data are to acquire (one time for second)
1836  if(clCanard.getUpTimeSecond()!=getUpTimeSecondCurr)
1837  {
1838  // Update check next acquire test
1839  getUpTimeSecondCurr = clCanard.getUpTimeSecond();
1840  if (param.rtcLock->Take(Ticks::MsToTicks(RTC_WAIT_DELAY_MS))) {
1841  curEpoch = rtc.getEpoch();
1842  param.rtcLock->Give();
1843  }
1844  // need do acquire istant value for display?
1845  // N.B. param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_istant automatic resetted when node entering onLine from offLine
1846  // Read data only if Display or other Task need to show/get this value
1847  if((param.system_status->flags.display_on)||(bStartupGetIstant)) {
1848  if ((curEpoch / CONFIGURATION_DEFAULT_UPDATE_IST_S) != param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_istant) {
1849  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1850  param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_istant = curEpoch / CONFIGURATION_DEFAULT_UPDATE_IST_S;
1851  param.system_status->datetime.epoch_sensors_get_istant = (curEpoch / CONFIGURATION_DEFAULT_UPDATE_IST_S) * CONFIGURATION_DEFAULT_UPDATE_IST_S;
1852  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1853  bStartGetIstant = true;
1854  }
1855  }
1856  // need do acquire data value for RMAP Archive?
1857  // Perform an Full Power request Method SEC_WAKE_UP_MODULE_FOR_QUERY (5) second before Starting aquire data
1858  // In this time we can regulate syncro_time method and perform Full Wake UP of remote Module
1859  if (((curEpoch + SEC_WAKE_UP_MODULE_FOR_QUERY) / param.configuration->report_s) != param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_value) {
1860  // WakeUP Network for reading sensor and Synncronize date_time
1861  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Rmap data server: Start full power for sending request and syncronize time\r\n"));
1862  // Only for RMAP Get Data is need to Forced power ON on Starting time before procedure GET DATA
1863  // RMAP Get data dont' start with command request automatic but some second before (also syncro_time)
1864  // This is need to fix problem of request ON/OFF continuative for module and simulate waiting command...
1865  bStartSetFullPower = true;
1866  // Starting server get data (dont stop when bStartSetFullPower is setted. Only for Set Full POWER)
1867  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1868  param.system_status->flags.rmap_server_running = true;
1869  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1870  } else {
1871  // Normal mode (Not WakeUP)
1872  bStartSetFullPower = false;
1873  }
1874  if ((curEpoch / param.configuration->report_s) != param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_value) {
1875  // WakeUP Network for reading sensor and Synncronize date_time
1876  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Rmap data server: Start acquire request to sensor network\r\n"));
1877  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1878  param.system_status->datetime.ptr_time_for_sensors_get_value = curEpoch / param.configuration->report_s;
1879  param.system_status->datetime.epoch_sensors_get_value = (curEpoch / param.configuration->report_s) * param.configuration->report_s;
1880  // Calculate expected/recived HeartBeat sequence... and reset counter
1881  // Only At first data % can be < 100%, depending of acquire time but isn't a real error
1882  for(uint8_t iSlave = 0; iSlave < BOARDS_COUNT_MAX; iSlave++) {
1883  // Calculate % from correct Heartbeat sequence TX-RX Transaction Completed (if one is executed)
1884  if(param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx > MIN_VALID_HEARTBEAT_RX) {
1885  if(param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx > MIN_TRANSACTION_HEARTBEAT_RX) {
1886  param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].perc_can_comm_err = (uint8_t)((float)(param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx_err - MIN_TRANSACTION_HEARTBEAT_RX) / (float)(param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx) * 100.0);
1887  } else {
1888  param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].perc_can_comm_err = 0;
1889  }
1890  } else {
1891  param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].perc_can_comm_err = 100;
1892  }
1893  // Reset Next Counter for next acquire data
1894  param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx = 0;
1895  param.system_status->data_slave[iSlave].heartbeat_rx_err = 0;
1896  }
1897  // Require new connection at time (report time is passed)
1898  param.system_status->flags.new_start_connect = true;
1899  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1900  bStartGetData = true;
1901  }
1902  }
1903  // ************* END GET SYNCRO ACTIVITY FOR CYPAL FUNCTION **************
1904 
1905  // ***********************************************************************
1906  // ********************** RMAP GETDATA TX-> RX<- *************************
1907  // ***********************************************************************
1908 
1909  // IS START COMMAND DATA RMAP AUTOMATIC REQUEST (From Local Syncro Activity UP...)?
1910  // Get Istant Data or Archive Data Request (Need to Display, Saving Data or other Function with Istant/Archive Data)
1911  if ((bStartGetIstant)||(bStartGetData)) {
1912  // For all node
1913  // bStartGetData are priority Command if both requested
1914  for(uint8_t queueId=0; queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; queueId++) {
1915  // For all node onLine
1916  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].is_online()) {
1917  // Command are sending without other Pending Command
1918  // Service request structure is same for all RMAP object to simplify function
1919  if(!clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.is_pending()) {
1920  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Inviato richiesta dati al nodo remoto: %d\r\n"), clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id());
1921  // parametri.canale = rmap_service_setmode_1_0_CH01 (es-> set CH Analogico...)
1922  // parametri.run_for_second = 900; ( not used for get_istant )
1923  rmap_service_setmode_1_0 paramRequest;
1924  paramRequest.chanel = 0; // Request only for chanel analog/digital adressed 1..X
1925  // higher priority guaranteed
1926  if(bStartGetData) {
1927  paramRequest.command = rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last;
1928  paramRequest.obs_sectime = param.configuration->observation_s;
1929  paramRequest.run_sectime = param.configuration->report_s;
1930  } else {
1931  paramRequest.command = rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_istant;
1932  paramRequest.obs_sectime = 0;
1933  paramRequest.run_sectime = 0;
1934  }
1935  // Imposta il pending del comando per verifica sequenza TX-RX e il TimeOut e in num retry.
1936  // La risposta al comando è già nel blocco dati, non necessaria ulteriore variabile
1937  clCanard.send_rmap_data_pending(queueId, NODE_GETDATA_TIMEOUT_US, paramRequest, NODE_GETDATA_MAX_RETRY);
1938  // Avvio il server RMAP Request
1939  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1940  param.system_status->flags.rmap_server_running = true;
1941  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
1942  }
1943  }
1944  }
1945  // Remove start command request when command are sent
1946  bStartGetIstant = false;
1947  bStartGetData = false;
1948  }
1949 
1950  // EVENT GESTION OF TIMEOUT AT REQUEST
1951  if(param.system_status->flags.rmap_server_running) {
1952 
1953  // Check if file server are current in running state
1954  bool rmapServerEnd = true;
1955  // Waiting WARM_UP (GetSyncroTime UP Procedure before end server)
1956  if(bStartSetFullPower) rmapServerEnd = false;
1957 
1958  for(uint8_t queueId=0; queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; queueId++) {
1959  // Check if is request pending... (NONE... flag remaining true END Server)
1960  if (clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.is_pending()) {
1961  rmapServerEnd = false;
1962  }
1963  if (clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.event_timeout()) {
1964  // Next retry if is possible Stop and estart pending
1965  clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending();
1966  if(!clCanard.send_rmap_data_pending_retry(queueId, NODE_GETDATA_TIMEOUT_US)) {
1967  // TimeOUT di un comando in attesa... end Retry
1968  TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Timeout risposta su richiesta dati al nodo remoto: %d, Warning [restore pending command]\r\n"),
1969  clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id());
1970  } else {
1971  rmapServerEnd = false;
1972  // TimeOUT di un comando in attesa... gestione Retry
1973  TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Timeout risposta su richiesta dati al nodo remoto: %d, Warning [retry command: %d]\r\n"),
1974  clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id(), clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.retry + 1);
1975  }
1976  }
1977  }
1978  // EVENT GESTION OF RECIVED DATA AT REQUEST
1979  for(uint8_t queueId=0; queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; queueId++) {
1980  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.is_executed()) {
1981  clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.reset_pending();
1982  // Interprete del messaggio in casting dal puntatore dinamico
1983  // Nell'esempio Il modulo e TH, naturalmente bisogna gestire il tipo
1984  // in funzione di clCanard.slave[x].node_type
1985  switch (clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type()) {
1986  case Module_Type::th:
1987  // Cast to th module
1988  retTHData = (rmap_service_module_TH_Response_1_0*) clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_response();
1989  // data RMAP type is ready to send into queue Archive Data for Saving on SD Memory
1990  // Get parameter data
1991  #if TRACE_LEVEL >= TRACE_INFO
1992  getStimaNameByType(stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type());
1993  #endif
1994  // Put data in system_status with module_type and RMAP Ver.Rev if not equal (reload or updated)
1995  if((param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version!=retTHData->version) ||
1996  (param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision!=retTHData->revision)) {
1997  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
1998  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version = retTHData->version;
1999  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision = retTHData->revision;
2000  // Module type also setted on load config module CAN
2001  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2002  // Reset flag before recheck exixting firmware available
2003  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].fw_upgradable = false;
2004  // Check if module can be updated
2005  for(uint8_t checkId=0; checkId<STIMA_MODULE_TYPE_MAX_AVAIABLE; checkId++) {
2006  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].module_type) {
2007  if((param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].version > retTHData->version) ||
2008  ((param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].version == retTHData->version) &&
2009  (param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].revision > retTHData->revision))) {
2010  // Found an upgradable boards
2011  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].fw_upgradable = true;
2012  }
2013  break;
2014  }
2015  }
2016  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2017  }
2018  // TRACE Info data
2019  TRACE_INFO_F(F("RMAP recived response data module from [ %s ], node id: %d. Response code: %d\r\n"),
2020  stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id(), retTHData->state);
2021  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Value (ITH) TP %d, UH: %d\r\n"), retTHData->ITH.temperature.val.value, retTHData->ITH.humidity.val.value);
2022  // Get security remote state on maintenance mode from 4.2 Version
2023  if((retTHData->version>4)||((retTHData->version==4)&&(retTHData->revision>=2))) {
2024  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode = (retTHData->state & CAN_FLAG_IS_MAINTENANCE_MODE);
2025  }
2026  retTHData->state &= CAN_FLAG_MASK_MAINTENANCE_MODE;
2027  if(param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode) {
2028  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Warning this module is in maintenance mode!!!\r\n"));
2029  }
2030  // Put istant data in system_status
2031  if(retTHData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_istant) {
2032  // Only istant request LCD or other device
2033  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2034  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].data_value[0] = retTHData->ITH.temperature.val.value;
2035  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].data_value[1] = retTHData->ITH.humidity.val.value;
2036  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].is_new_ist_data_ready = true;
2037  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2038  } else if(retTHData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last) {
2039  // data value id rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last into queue SD
2040  // Copy Flag State
2041  bit8Flag = 0;
2042  if(retTHData->is_main_error) bit8Flag|=0x01;
2043  if(retTHData->is_redundant_error) bit8Flag|=0x02;
2044  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2045  param.system_status->flags.new_data_to_send = true;
2046  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].bit8StateFlag = bit8Flag;
2047  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[0] = retTHData->rbt_event;
2048  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[1] = retTHData->wdt_event;
2049  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[2] = retTHData->perc_i2c_error;
2050  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2051  // Copy Data
2052  memset(&rmap_archive_data, 0, sizeof(rmap_archive_data_t));
2053  // Set Module Type, Date Time as Uint32 GetEpoch_Style, and Block Data Cast to RMAP Type
2054  rmap_archive_data.module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2055  rmap_archive_data.date_time = param.system_status->datetime.epoch_sensors_get_value;
2056  memcpy(rmap_archive_data.block, retTHData, sizeof(*retTHData));
2057  // Send queue to SD for direct archive data
2058  // Queue is dimensioned to accept all Data for one step pushing array data (MAX_BOARDS)
2059  // Clean queue if is full to send alwayl the last data on getted value
2060  if(param.dataRmapPutQueue->IsFull()) param.dataLogPutQueue->Dequeue(&rmap_archive_empty);
2061  param.dataRmapPutQueue->Enqueue(&rmap_archive_data, Ticks::MsToTicks(CAN_PUT_QUEUE_RMAP_TIMEOUT_MS));
2062  }
2063  break;
2064 
2065  case Module_Type::rain:
2066  // Cast to th module
2067  retRainData = (rmap_service_module_Rain_Response_1_0*) clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_response();
2068  // data RMAP type is ready to send into queue Archive Data for Saving on SD Memory
2069  // Get parameter data
2070  #if TRACE_LEVEL >= TRACE_INFO
2071  getStimaNameByType(stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type());
2072  #endif
2073  // Put data in system_status with module_type and RMAP Ver.Rev if not equal (reload or updated)
2074  if((param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version!=retRainData->version) ||
2075  (param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision!=retRainData->revision)) {
2076  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2077  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version = retRainData->version;
2078  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision = retRainData->revision;
2079  // Module type also setted on load config module CAN
2080  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2081  // Reset flag before recheck exixting firmware available
2082  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].fw_upgradable = false;
2083  // Check if module can be updated
2084  for(uint8_t checkId=0; checkId<STIMA_MODULE_TYPE_MAX_AVAIABLE; checkId++) {
2085  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].module_type) {
2086  if((param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].version > retRainData->version) ||
2087  ((param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].version == retRainData->version) &&
2088  (param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].revision > retRainData->revision))) {
2089  // Found an upgradable boards
2090  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].fw_upgradable = true;
2091  }
2092  break;
2093  }
2094  }
2095  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2096  }
2097  // TRACE Info data
2098  TRACE_INFO_F(F("RMAP recived response data module from [ %s ], node id: %d. Response code: %d\r\n"),
2099  stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id(), retRainData->state);
2100  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Value (TBR) Rain %d\r\n"), retRainData->TBR.rain.val.value);
2101  // Get security remote state on maintenance mode from 4.2 Version
2102  if((retRainData->version>4)||((retRainData->version==4)&&(retRainData->revision>=2))) {
2103  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode = (retRainData->state & CAN_FLAG_IS_MAINTENANCE_MODE);
2104  }
2105  retRainData->state &= CAN_FLAG_MASK_MAINTENANCE_MODE;
2106  if(param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode) {
2107  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Warning this module is in maintenance mode!!!\r\n"));
2108  }
2109  // Put istant data in system_status
2110  if(retRainData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_istant) {
2111  // Only istant request LCD or other device
2112  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2113  // Rain value istant depending from request type. If request is get_istant (Rain is FullRain)
2114  // Full Rain is Real Rain + Maintenance Rain Value, Otherwise if request is Get_Data, Rain is only
2115  // Real Rain data (without maintenece value). Master can set via CAN (...LCD Command) Maintenance Mode
2116  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].data_value[0] = retRainData->TBR.rain.val.value;
2117  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].is_new_ist_data_ready = true;
2118  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2119  } else if(retRainData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last) {
2120  // data value id rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last into queue SD
2121  // Copy Flag State
2122  bit8Flag = 0;
2123  if(retRainData->is_main_error) bit8Flag|=0x01;
2124  if(retRainData->is_redundant_error) bit8Flag|=0x02;
2125  if(retRainData->is_tipping_error) bit8Flag|=0x04;
2126  if(retRainData->is_clogged_up) bit8Flag|=0x08;
2127  if(retRainData->is_bubble_level_error) bit8Flag|=0x10;
2128  if(retRainData->is_accelerometer_error) bit8Flag|=0x20;
2129  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2130  param.system_status->flags.new_data_to_send = true;
2131  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].bit8StateFlag = bit8Flag;
2132  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[0] = retRainData->rbt_event;
2133  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[1] = retRainData->wdt_event;
2134  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[2] = 0;
2135  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2136  // Copy Data
2137  memset(&rmap_archive_data, 0, sizeof(rmap_archive_data_t));
2138  // Set Module Type, Date Time as Uint32 GetEpoch_Style, and Block Data Cast to RMAP Type
2139  rmap_archive_data.module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2140  rmap_archive_data.date_time = param.system_status->datetime.epoch_sensors_get_value;
2141  memcpy(rmap_archive_data.block, retRainData, sizeof(*retRainData));
2142  // Send queue to SD for direct archive data
2143  // Queue is dimensioned to accept all Data for one step pushing array data (MAX_BOARDS)
2144  // Clean queue if is full to send alwayl the last data on getted value
2145  if(param.dataRmapPutQueue->IsFull()) param.dataLogPutQueue->Dequeue(&rmap_archive_empty);
2146  param.dataRmapPutQueue->Enqueue(&rmap_archive_data, Ticks::MsToTicks(CAN_PUT_QUEUE_RMAP_TIMEOUT_MS));
2147  }
2148  break;
2149 
2150  case Module_Type::wind:
2151  // Cast to th module
2152  retWindData = (rmap_service_module_Wind_Response_1_0*) clCanard.slave[queueId].rmap_service.get_response();
2153  // data RMAP type is ready to send into queue Archive Data for Saving on SD Memory
2154  // Get parameter data
2155  #if TRACE_LEVEL >= TRACE_INFO
2156  getStimaNameByType(stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type());
2157  #endif
2158  // Put data in system_status with module_type and RMAP Ver.Rev if not equal (reload or updated)
2159  if((param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version!=retWindData->version) ||
2160  (param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision!=retWindData->revision)) {
2161  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2162  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_version = retWindData->version;
2163  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_revision = retWindData->revision;
2164  // Module type also setted on load config module CAN
2165  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2166  // Reset flag before recheck exixting firmware available
2167  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].fw_upgradable = false;
2168  // Check if module can be updated
2169  for(uint8_t checkId=0; checkId<STIMA_MODULE_TYPE_MAX_AVAIABLE; checkId++) {
2170  if(clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type() == param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].module_type) {
2171  if((param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].version > retWindData->version) ||
2172  ((param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].version == retWindData->version) &&
2173  (param.system_status->boards_update_avaiable[checkId].revision > retWindData->revision))) {
2174  // Found an upgradable boards
2175  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].fw_upgradable = true;
2176  }
2177  break;
2178  }
2179  }
2180  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2181  }
2182  // TRACE Info data
2183  TRACE_INFO_F(F("RMAP recived response data module from [ %s ], node id: %d. Response code: %d\r\n"),
2184  stimaName, clCanard.slave[queueId].get_node_id(), retWindData->state);
2185  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Value (DWA) Speed %d, Dir: %d\r\n"), retWindData->DWA.speed.val.value, retWindData->DWA.direction.val.value);
2186  // Get security remote state on maintenance mode from 4.2 Version
2187  if((retWindData->version>4)||((retWindData->version==4)&&(retWindData->revision>=2))) {
2188  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode = (retWindData->state & CAN_FLAG_IS_MAINTENANCE_MODE);
2189  }
2190  retWindData->state &= CAN_FLAG_MASK_MAINTENANCE_MODE;
2191  if(param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].maintenance_mode) {
2192  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Warning this module is in maintenance mode!!!\r\n"));
2193  }
2194  // Put istant data in system_status
2195  if(retWindData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_istant) {
2196  // Only istant request LCD or other device
2197  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2198  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].data_value[0] = retWindData->DWA.speed.val.value;
2199  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].data_value[1] = retWindData->DWA.direction.val.value;
2200  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].is_new_ist_data_ready = true;
2201  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2202  } else if(retWindData->state == rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last) {
2203  // data value id rmap_service_setmode_1_0_get_last into queue SD
2204  // Copy Flag State
2205  bit8Flag = 0;
2206  if(retWindData->is_windsonic_responding_error) bit8Flag|=0x01;
2207  if(retWindData->is_windsonic_hardware_error) bit8Flag|=0x02;
2208  if(retWindData->is_windsonic_unit_error) bit8Flag|=0x04;
2209  if(retWindData->is_windsonic_axis_error) bit8Flag|=0x08;
2210  if(retWindData->is_windsonic_crc_error) bit8Flag|=0x10;
2211  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2212  param.system_status->flags.new_data_to_send = true;
2213  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].bit8StateFlag = bit8Flag;
2214  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[0] = retWindData->rbt_event;
2215  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[1] = retWindData->wdt_event;
2216  param.system_status->data_slave[queueId].byteStateFlag[2] = retWindData->perc_rs232_error;
2217  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2218  // Copy Data
2219  memset(&rmap_archive_data, 0, sizeof(rmap_archive_data_t));
2220  // Set Module Type, Date Time as Uint32 GetEpoch_Style, and Block Data Cast to RMAP Type
2221  rmap_archive_data.module_type = clCanard.slave[queueId].get_module_type();
2222  rmap_archive_data.date_time = param.system_status->datetime.epoch_sensors_get_value;
2223  memcpy(rmap_archive_data.block, retWindData, sizeof(*retWindData));
2224  // Send queue to SD for direct archive data
2225  // Queue is dimensioned to accept all Data for one step pushing array data (MAX_BOARDS)
2226  // Clean queue if is full to send alwayl the last data on getted value
2227  if(param.dataRmapPutQueue->IsFull()) param.dataLogPutQueue->Dequeue(&rmap_archive_empty);
2228  param.dataRmapPutQueue->Enqueue(&rmap_archive_data, Ticks::MsToTicks(CAN_PUT_QUEUE_RMAP_TIMEOUT_MS));
2229  }
2230  break;

2504  // ***********************************************************************
2505  // ************* REMOTE RPC UAVCAN REQUEST FUNCTION SERVER ***************
2506  // ***********************************************************************
2507  // Get coda comandi da system_message... se richiesto comando da LCD o RPC Remota
2508  // Da inoltrare al nodo selezionato in coda, parametro
2509  if(!param.systemMessageQueue->IsEmpty()) {
2510  // Message queue is for CAN (If FW Upgrade local Master, Message is for SD...)
2511  if(param.systemMessageQueue->Peek(&system_message, 0)) {

2516  // Procedure can continue only without other command in pending state
2517  // If command not starting, time_out remove the command and queue can be free from item

2526  param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);

2528  // Request start module maintenance from LCD or Remote RPC with Param 0/1
2529  char do_maint = 1;
2530  clCanard.send_command_pending(system_message.node_id, NODE_COMMAND_TIMEOUT_US,
2531  canardClass::Command_Private::module_maintenance, &do_maint, sizeof(do_maint));
2532  // Starting message server
2533  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2534  param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running = true;
2535  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2536  message_traced = false;
2537  } else {
2538  // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for type of command

2542  param.systemStatusLock->Take();

2545  }

2690  // REMOTE REGISTER Modify (All module slave)

2694  // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start

2698  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: Send register modify at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2699  // Send register value (Set type from Uavcan Type register selection)
2700  // uavcan_register select and set value (default is empty)
2701  uavcan_register_Value_1_0 rpcRegisterValue = {0};
2702  uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_empty_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2703  switch (system_message.param) {

2706  rpcRegisterValue.bit.value.count = 1;
2707  rpcRegisterValue.bit.value.bitpacked[0] = system_message.value.bool_val;
2708  break;
2709  case RVS_TYPE_INTEGER_8:
2710  uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_integer8_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2711  rpcRegisterValue.integer8.value.count = 1;
2712  rpcRegisterValue.integer8.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.int8_val;
2713  break;
2714  case RVS_TYPE_INTEGER_16:
2715  uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_integer16_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2716  rpcRegisterValue.integer16.value.count = 1;
2717  rpcRegisterValue.integer16.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.int16_val;
2718  break;
2719  case RVS_TYPE_INTEGER_32:
2720  uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_integer32_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2721  rpcRegisterValue.integer32.value.count = 1;
2722  rpcRegisterValue.integer32.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.int32_val;
2723  break;

2725  uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_integer64_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2726  rpcRegisterValue.integer64.value.count = 1;

2728  break;
2729  case RVS_TYPE_NATURAL_8:
2730  uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_natural8_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2731  rpcRegisterValue.natural8.value.count = 1;
2732  rpcRegisterValue.natural8.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.uint8_val;
2733  break;
2734  case RVS_TYPE_NATURAL_16:
2735  uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_natural16_(&rpcRegisterValue);
2736  rpcRegisterValue.natural16.value.count = 1;
2737  rpcRegisterValue.natural16.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.uint16_val;
2738  break;

2751  rpcRegisterValue.real16.value.count = 1;
2752  rpcRegisterValue.real16.value.elements[0] = system_message.value.float_val;
2753  break;

2755  uavcan_register_Value_1_0_select_real32_(&rpcRegisterValue);

2772  } else {
2773  // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for setting register
2774  if(!message_traced) {

2777  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2778  param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
2779  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2780  }

2783  }
2784  }

2788  // La verifica verrà fatta con il Flag Pending resettato e la risposta viene
2789  // popolata nel'apposito registro di state service_module del il servizio relativo
2790  // Il set data avviene in processReciveTranser alle sezioni CanardTransferKindResponse
2791  // Eventuale Flag TimeOut indica un'avvenuta mancata risposta al comando
2792  // Il master una volta inviato il comando deve attendere ResetPending o TimeOutCommand
2793  // Are command server running? Process request or verify END procedure
2794  if(param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running) {
2795 
2796  // Check if file server are current in running state
2797  bool cmdServerEnd = true;
2798 
2799  for(uint8_t cmd_server_queueId=0; cmd_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; cmd_server_queueId++) {
2800 
2801  // state != standby? Running current procedure...
2802  if(clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.is_pending())
2803  cmdServerEnd = false;
2804 
2805  if (clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.event_timeout()) {
2806  // Rimuovo gli stati
2807  clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.reset_pending();
2808  // TimeOUT di un comando in attesa... gestisco il da farsi Retry? Abort? Signal?
2809  TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Command server: time out command at Node: [ %d ], Warning [restore pending command]\r\n"),
2810  clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2811  }
2812  if (clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.is_executed()) {
2813  // Rimuovo gli stati
2814  clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.reset_pending();
2815  // Command OK. Signal?
2816  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Command server: confirmed command at Node: [ %d ], response code value: [ %d ]\r\n"),
2817  clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id(), clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.get_response());
2818  }
2819  }
2820 
2821  // End server distribution command
2822  if(cmdServerEnd) {
2823  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2824  param.system_status->flags.cmd_server_running = false;
2825  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2826  }
2827  } else {
2828  // Security off pending status
2829  for(uint8_t cmd_server_queueId=0; cmd_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; cmd_server_queueId++) {
2830  clCanard.slave[cmd_server_queueId].command.reset_pending();
2831  }
2832  }
2833  // ************************* END COMMAND SERVER **************************
2834 
2835  // La verifica verrà fatta con il Flag Pending resettato e la risposta viene
2836  // popolata nel'apposito registro di state service_module del il servizio relativo
2837  // Il set data avviene in processReciveTranser alle sezioni CanardTransferKindResponse
2838  // Eventuale Flag TimeOut indica un'avvenuta mancata risposta al comando
2839  // Il master una volta inviato il registro deve attendere ResetPending o TimeOutCommand
2840  // Are register server running? Process request or verify END procedure
2841  // Configure method (list_register_sequence) are prioritary. If running configuration server
2842  // register server it shouldn't work at all. Only at the end can be completed...
2843  if((param.system_status->flags.reg_server_running)&&
2844  (!param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running)) {
2845 
2846  // Check if file server are current in running state
2847  bool regServerEnd = true;
2848 
2849  for(uint8_t reg_server_queueId=0; reg_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; reg_server_queueId++) {
2850 
2851  // state != standby? Running current procedure...
2852  if(clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.is_pending())
2853  regServerEnd = false;
2854 
2855  if (clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.event_timeout()) {
2856  // Rimuovo gli stati
2857  clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
2858  // TimeOUT di un comando in attesa... gestisco il da farsi Retry? Abort? Signal?
2859  TRACE_ERROR_F(F("Register server: time out command at Node: [ %d ], Warning [restore pending command]\r\n"),
2860  clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2861  }
2862  if (clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.is_executed()) {
2863  // Rimuovo gli stati
2864  clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
2865  // Command OK.
2866  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: confirmed modify value at Node: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2867  }
2868  }
2869 
2870  // End server distribution command
2871  if(regServerEnd) {
2872  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2873  param.system_status->flags.reg_server_running = false;
2874  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2875  }
2876  } else {
2877  // Security off pending status
2878  for(uint8_t reg_server_queueId=0; reg_server_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; reg_server_queueId++) {
2879  clCanard.slave[reg_server_queueId].register_access.reset_pending();
2880  }
2881  }
2882  // ************************* END REGISTER SERVER *************************
2883 
2884 
2885  // ***********************************************************************
2886  // ****** REMOTE REGISTER GET/SET SERVER AND REMOTE CONFIGURATION *******
2887  // ***********************************************************************
2888 
2889  // Avvio configurazione remota automatica su richiesta slave (Appena CONFIGURATO da PNP)
2890  // La procedura parte solo senza register_server in funzione (un solo avvio ammesso)
2891  // Si avvia generalmente dopo il PnP o su un modulo parzialmente configurato con solo il node_id
2892  if((param.system_status->flags.run_module_configure)&&
2893  (!param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running)) {
2894  for(uint8_t cfg_remote_queueId=0; cfg_remote_queueId<MAX_NODE_CONNECT; cfg_remote_queueId++) {
2895  // Check Configurazione non attiva su un nodo configurato e online
2896  // FALSE se il nodo non è configurato nei reglistri Metadati e Porte RMAP
2897  // Determino se avviare la configfurazione di un nodo apprena programmato con PnP...
2898  // O comunque di un nodo preventivamente programmato con node_id ma senza metadati
2899  if(clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].is_online()) {
2900  // N.B: Se ho appena terminato la procedura HeratBeat potrebbe essere arrivato con Status Update request,
2901  // Quindi non eseguo la configurazione, e attendo l'eleimnazione del flag e la rilettura dello stato remoto cfg
2902  // Anche nel caso di configurazione già in corso non processo il comando. Esco e attendo la fine del PNP/CFG
2903  if((!clCanard.slave[cfg_remote_queueId].heartbeat.get_module_ready()) &&
2904  (!remote_configure_reboot[cfg_remote_queueId]) &&
2905  (!remote_configure[cfg_remote_queueId])) {
2906  // Module not configured.
2907  // Starting configuration procedure with push command to queue
2908  // Queue gestion power UP, starting command ecc... is performed
2909  // After terminate procedure and reboot remote Node. Configuration is ready
2910  system_message_t system_message = {0};
2911  system_message.task_dest = CAN_TASK_ID;
2912  system_message.command.do_remote_cfg = true;
2913  system_message.node_id = cfg_remote_queueId;
2914  param.systemMessageQueue->Enqueue(&system_message, 0);
2915  }
2916  }
2917  }
2918  }
2919 
2920  // Get coda config register da system_message... se richiesto comando da LCD, RPC Remota, PNP
2921  // Avvia la configurazione remota con la sequenza dei registri da programmare
2922  // LA configurazione può essere avviato solo con nodo già configurato almeno con port_id Valido
2923  // Evidentemente un nodo non ancora assegnato può essere configurato solo dopo assegnamento PNP del port_id
2924  // Al termine del PnP port_id, deve essere avviata sempre la procedura di configurazione del nodo remoto
2925  if(!param.systemMessageQueue->IsEmpty()) {
2926  // Message queue is for CAN (If FW Upgrade local Master, Message is for SD...)
2927  if(param.systemMessageQueue->Peek(&system_message, 0)) {
2928  // Only local task post message queue can be processed here
2929  // Messages checked here can only be addressed to remote slaves. So the addresses must be in the valid area
2930  if((system_message.task_dest == LOCAL_TASK_ID) && (system_message.node_id < MAX_NODE_CONNECT)) {

2932  if(system_message.command.do_remote_cfg) {

2934  clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].configure(
2935  param.configuration->board_slave[system_message.node_id].can_address,
2936  param.configuration->board_slave[system_message.node_id].module_type,
2937  param.configuration->board_slave[system_message.node_id].can_port_id,
2938  param.configuration->board_slave[system_message.node_id].can_publish_id,
2939  param.configuration->board_slave[system_message.node_id].serial_number);

2941  // Queue must to be free !!!
2942  if(!clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].is_online()) {
2943  if(!remote_configure_wait_online_ms[system_message.node_id]) {
2944  remote_configure_wait_online_ms[system_message.node_id] = millis();
2945  } else {
2946  // Configuration impossible Module not Found OnLine after 4 sec from New Configuration
2947  if(millis() - remote_configure_wait_online_ms[system_message.node_id] > 4000) {
2948  // Remove message from the queue (No more action possible here NOT Online)
2949  param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2950  }
2951  }
2952  } else {
2953  // Start Flag Event Start when request configuration is request
2954  // When remote node recive VSC from Master Heartbeat Remote slave FullPower is performed
2955  // Then new state for slave (fullpower) are resend to master. If Ok procedure can start
2956  if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode() == Power_Mode::pwr_on) {
2957  // Remove message from the queue (ONLY IF REMOTE NODE IS FULL POWERED!!!)
2958  remote_configure_wait_online_ms[system_message.node_id] = 0;
2959  param.systemMessageQueue->Dequeue(&system_message);
2960  if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id() <= CANARD_NODE_ID_MAX) {
2961  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: Modify configuration at already configured module stimacan: [ %d ], current node id [ %d ]\r\n"), system_message.node_id + 1, clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id());
2962  } else {
2963  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: Start configuration at new module stimacan: [ %d ]\r\n"), system_message.node_id + 1);
2964  }
2965  if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].is_online()) {
2966  // START Remote configuration of Node -> system_message.node_id
2967  remote_configure[system_message.node_id] = REGISTER_STARTING;
2968  remote_configure_retry[system_message.node_id] = NODE_REGISTER_MAX_RETRY;
2969  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2970  param.system_status->flags.cfg_server_running = true;
2971  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2972  } else {
2973  if(clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id() <= CANARD_NODE_ID_MAX) {
2974  // Off line ... Not configure?
2975  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: ALERT stimacan: [ %d ], node id [ %d ] is OFF LINE. Node cannot be configured [ %s ]\r\n"), system_message.node_id + 1, clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].get_node_id(), ABORT_STRING);
2976  } else {
2977  // not configured yet (waitinq request PNP) ?
2978  TRACE_INFO_F(F("Register server: PNP save parameter for module stimacan: [ %d ]. Configuration is ready for remote PNP request.\r\n"),system_message.node_id + 1);
2979  }
2980  }
2981  } else {
2982  // IS NEED to Request FullPower Mode for type of command (if not yet request full power)
2983  if(!param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request) {
2984  TRACE_VERBOSE_F(F("Configuration module: Start full power for sending queue of command configuration to slave, old power state: [ %d ]\r\n"), clCanard.slave[system_message.node_id].heartbeat.get_power_mode());
2985  param.systemStatusLock->Take();
2986  param.system_status->flags.full_wakeup_request = true;
2987  param.systemStatusLock->Give();
2988  }
2989  }
2990  }
2991  }
2992  }
2993  }
2994  }
2995 
2996  // Are configuration remote node in execution?

3202  }

3235  // To read a register create register and set to unstructured and call send method. (Rx is performed)

3243  // TimeOUT di un comando in attesa... gestisco il da farsi

3246  if(remote_configure_retry[register_server_queueId]) {

3253  remote_configure[register_server_queueId] = 0;
3254  }

3262  if(remote_configure[register_server_queueId]) {

3295  // ***********************************************************************

3297  // ***********************************************************************
